content: on 46 sts using the german twisted cast on method follow the chart or written instructions below row 1 sl1wyif yo k to end 47 sts row 2 sl1wyif yo k3 *p1 sl1wyib k4* six times p1 sl1wyib k3 k2tog 47 sts row 3 repeat row 2 47 sts repeat row 2 and 3 for 5 5 ft / 1 6 m or until you ve reached your desired length work one more row 2 without yarning over after slipping the first stitch 46 sts cut and weave in ends hand wash gently in cool water lay flat to dry and enjoy 4 hat pattern directions each rounds instructions are repeated 6 7 8 times per round and every increase round adds 6 7 8 sts you may find it helpful to place stitch markers after every repeat to help prevent mistakes and make counting easier follow the chart or written instructions below cast on 12 14 16 sts using the magic_ring cast on method 12 14 16 total sts round 1 knit all sts round 2 k1 m1rp k1 18 21 24 sts round 3 knit all sts round 4 p1 k1 p1 m1rp 24 28 32 sts round 5 k1 sl1wyib k2 round 6 *p1 k1* twice
